title: Behind Closed Doors -The Truth about The Scooter Store from a Former Employee
description: Have you heard of The Scooter Store? Do you know what they do or the kind of people they help?Perhaps you have heard of the recent FBI raids or Medicare Fraud Claims. Maybe you have seen someone riding around in a Power Chair or seen the Advertisements on television.Do you want to know what the truth is? Do you want to know what really happened at The Scooter Store?Hear it from an employees first hand account. Learn the truth about what really went on Behind Closed Doors.
author: Theresa M. Jones
